trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for lengths of <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""></xref> between spoken words.
trans-unit.target: A hosszának értékeinek enumerálása <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmphasisBreak" name="EmphasisBreak" href=""> </xref> szóbeli szavakat közötti.

trans-unit.source: The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: A szünet hangsúlyt-példányok <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>keresztül a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>tulajdonság az <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>objektum a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>példányon található <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> tulajdonság</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> által visszaadott</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> értéke

trans-unit.source: Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes szintetikus beszédfelismerési motor szó; közötti oldaltörések megjelenítéséhez, hogyan lehet szabad hangsúlyt jellegét a nyelveket, nyelvjárást, genders vagy hangok eltérnek.

trans-unit.source: Both EmphasisBreak and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
trans-unit.target: Mindkét EmphasisBreak és <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>is használható, ha a beállítás, illetve a a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>a egy <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>példány.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>

trans-unit.source: The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of EmphasisBreak are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance.
trans-unit.target: A két érték lehet, hogy elkülönítsék a tényt, hogy a tényleges értékek a EmphasisBreak-e minden kisebb, mint nulla és értékeit <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>nagyobb vagy egyenlő nulla; és az értékének <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>által visszaadott a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>tulajdonságát a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>által visszaadott objektum a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>tulajdonság példányhoz.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>
